subject: Re: Order #SSN1824, how did it go?
description_text:
Didn't get the haptics yet

On Mon, Jul 7, 2025, 5:10 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello grace, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi tommy greico, We will continue to monitor and follow up on your shipping order.
Hi tommy greico,    Please don't worry, your package will be delivered for you in two days.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXZ2440888146YQ
